snippet.title: Reach: SOS - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Reach: SOS is a point-and-click puzzle adventure game where you take on the role of Shadow, a deeply lonely and isolated outpost worker that starts receiving cryptic messages. Who is sending them? And why do you already know them??

Play the demo for FREE 
on Google Play : https://bit.ly/ReachGooglePlay
or on the Apple App Store: https://bit.ly/ReachAppStore

FOLLOW us on twitter for updates on the game: https://twitter.com/Reach_TheGame
